Custom-made AM Drums

.   .   .   .   .   .   .   .

Ma Rustic has been making AM Drums for several years, and our steel tongue drums have found their soul mates in countries all around the world. Our experience and expertise promise you a unique and special musical instrument of the finest quality, which many find to be the perfect alternative to a hang drum from Panart.

Making AM Drums is an art, with our main focus on the quality of sound and tuning, which we believe to be most important, as this is what gives them the soothing, magical sound, which has been likened to Tibetan bowls (or to the Swiss hang or idiopan instrument). 

AM Drums can be tuned to any musical scale. Here are some example scales which we use to tune our hank drums:

Oriental - C D F A A# C D F

Ake Bono (Japanese) - G, C, D, Eb, G, Ab, C, D

Banshiki cho (Japanese) -: F C D# F G# A# C D# F

Pentatonic C Major - G, C, D, E, G, A, C, D

Pentatonic G Minor - G Bb C D F G Bb C

Pygmy - G C D D# G A# C D D#

Raga Vutari - C E F# G A Bb C

Rock 'n Roll - C D# E F G A Bb C

AM Drums can also be painted in the colour of your choice (according to their usual design) at no extra cost, with your slit drum ready for dispatch in 2 weeks.

name: AM Drum - Chakra scale 432Hz - steel tongue hank tank handpan hang drum
description:
N.B. Please note - this drum is made to order and therefore will be delivered after Christmas.

Here you can order an AM Drum tuned to the Chakra scale, in the frequency of 432Hz.

http://youtu.be/f99zpn-ojTU

The Chakra AM Drum is made to order, so please see below for delivery details.

Chakras, in Hindu and Buddhist belief systems, are centres of Prāṇa, life force, or vital energy.  Chakras correspond to vital points in the physical body i.e. major plexuses of arteries, veins and nerves.

Weak Chakras can cause problems in all areas of your life, so it is beneficial to try to energize these centres. Alongside meditation, music therapy can also be used to awaken the Chakras, as they have been found to be stimulated by particular sound frequencies.

A steel tongue drum, tuned to the right musical frequencies, would be the perfect companion to meditation for awakening the Chakras.

AM Drums make a special Chakra drum for this purpose. Please see link to Youtube to listen, and to see the paintwork/design.

http://youtu.be/f99zpn-ojTU

Visit our website and buy online:

www.amsteeltonguedrums.com

For more information, questions or just to say hi, email: amdrums@live.com

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 

Certain musical notes are often associated with individual Chakras of the human body. While there are in excess of 300 Chakras, these are the notes (and colours) believed to awaken the first 7 Chakras:

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

Root chakra - Muladhara - Represents our foundation and feeling of being grounded.

Red - note C

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

Sacral chakra - Swadhisthana - Our connection and ability to accept others and new experiences.

Orange - note D

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

Solar plexus chakra - Manipura / Nabhi - Our ability to be confident and in-control of our lives.

Yellow - note E

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

Heart chakra - Anahata - Our ability to love.

Green - note F

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

Throat chakra - Vishuddha - Our ability to communicate.

Blue - notes G

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

Third eye chakra - Ajna - Our ability to focus on and see the big picture.

Indigo - note A

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

Crown chakra - Sahasrara - Represents our ability to be fully connected spiritually.

Violet - note B

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

Seat of the Soul - also know as the Soul Star - the 8th Chakra - a hand width above the head, the point where spiritual energy... and Divine love, enters the body.

White - Note C (an octave higher than the first C).

.  .  .  .  .  .  .

We recommend an AM Drum in the Chakra scale for meditation, healing, personal awakening, spiritual transformation etc... But we also find that everyone is different, and maybe another music scale could also help with these things. 

Its best to choose a scale that speaks to you, that you feel reflects your soul.

AM Drums can be tuned to any musical scale. Here are some example scales which we use to tune AM Drums:

Oriental -  C D F A A# C D F

Ake Bono (Japanese) - G, C, D, Eb, G, Ab, C, D

Banshiki cho (Japanese) -: F C D# F  G# A# C  D# F

Pentatonic C Major - G, C, D, E, G, A, C, D

Pentatonic G Minor - G Bb C D F G Bb C

Pygmy -  G C D D# G  A# C  D  D#

Raga Vutari - C E F# G A Bb C

Rock 'n Roll - C D# E F G A Bb C

AM Drums can also be painted in the colour of your choice (according to their usual design) at no extra cost, with your AM Drum ready for dispatch in less than one week.
